description:
<p>This is an exciting and innovative new role that will enable the post holder to work in an integrated way across Health and Social Care in Portsmouth. This is an excellent opportunity for an experienced and motivated Nurse or Midwife to join the CCG’s Safeguarding Team.  As part of the CCG Safeguarding Team you will be supporting the Director of Quality and Safeguarding and Head of Safeguarding to gain assurance that their commissioned provider services are meeting their statutory requirements regarding Safeguarding.  The post holder will work across the health and social care community to provide professional advice and act as a subject expert relating to areas such as Mental Capacity Act (MCA), PREVENT, modern slavery and Domestic Abuse, Criminal and sexual exploitation and Looked After Children.</p>
<p>For an informal discussion please call Sarah Shore, Head of Safeguarding on 07768 861056 or email Sarah.shore@nhs.net</p>
title: Safeguarding Specialist Nurse
